charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) &; 841(b)(1)(A) DEFT DID KNOWLINGLY AND INTENTIONALLY POSSESS WITH THE INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE-"CRACK COCAINE,"A SCHEDULE II NARCOTIC CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE DRUG (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is committed to the custody of the US-BOP for a term of 95 months. Defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of 5 years. The defendant shall pay a $100.00 special assessment fee due immediately. The defendant shall pay a &;#03 6;200.00 fine. The fine shall be paid in monthly installments of at least $10.00 each, commencing on the 5th day of each month following the deft's release from imprisonment. The fine shall be paid in full not later than 20 months following the defendant's release from imprisonment. The defendant shall notify the US Clerk's Office for this district w/n 30 days of any change of mailing or residential address that occurs while any portion of the sum remains unpaid.
